slide.title: Adding a review

div.example:
<?php
$m = new MongoClient;
$c = $m->demo->whisky;

$newReview = array(
    user_name => "Michael",
    date => 2013-10-01,
    note => "No peat, but fruity",
    rating => 1,
);

$c->update(
    array( 'name' => 'Glenfiddich 15' ),
    array( '$push => array( 'notes' => $newReview ) )
);
?>
